version_description: More bug fixes, crash fixes, and polish!

We are ready to go for iOS 9!

Touch pressure recognition
- Enjoy more dynamic music play with Apple's 3D Touch (6s and 6s+ only). Control the volume of each note and express your creativity.

Check it out!

We are ready to go for iOS 9!

Touch pressure recognition
- Enjoy more dynamic music play with Apple's 3D Touch (6s and 6s+ only). Control the volume of each note and express your creativity.

Check it out!

- There are known iOS 9.0.1 issues for touch-enabled apps, so we recommend our piano players to upgrade to iOS9.1 when it becomes available. Let us know if you are still running into issues on iOS 9.1 at support@smule.com
- Fixed iPhone 6 display support
- Tuned our dynamic play for those with a light touch
More bug fixes, crash fixes, and polish!

75,000 New Songs!

Suggested Composers
Discover composers from the community we think you'll love.

Faster Start-Up
Magic Piano should launch much more quickly.

More Suggested Songs
We recommend even more songs for you to play next.
– Lots of under-the-hood improvements and bug fixes.

Enhanced Search
Now you can easily find your most recent searches.
Popular Songs
Songs in the Most Popular section are now unique to your country.
– Lots of under-the-hood improvements and bug fixes.

- The app and songbook launch much faster now — update the app and see for yourself!
- Learn more about each song by checking out our new Song Info Page.
– Lots of under-the-hood improvements and bug fixes.

Find Composers in Search
Find songs by your favorite composers in the community by searching for their username in search.

New Look
We've tidied up the Songbook a bit. Enjoy!
– Lots of under-the-hood improvements and bug fixes.

- We fixed that pesky bug that prevents some of your songs from showing up in the Songbook.
- Lots of under the hood improvements.

Ongoing Improvements
A few minor updates to increase the joy
